name: BigFileSharing a.k.a Bfs
body:
### Welcome to BigFileSharing Pages.
This project started when I needed to transfer a large video file to a friend. There are sites that offer this service but I wanted myself control the deposit of my files.
The idea is to do a project with the simplest possible without source code framework and without reinventing the wheel. I use [jquery](https://jquery.com) and [dropzonejs](http://www.dropzonejs.com) as third application.

### Required
- a web server (of course!)
- php 5.6 or up
- MySQL

### Install
Installation is very simple.
- Transfer the project to the root of your site (i.e: www / bfs)
- Create a directory that will upload files with write access by www-data (or apache)
- Setup config.ini

### Custon thumb
If you want custom thumb preview juste edit index.php, add extension in array (line 125-150)
